definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: It is composed of two parts with five chapters apart from the preface and the conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 除前言和结语外，分上下两篇共五章。
由史蒂夫前言“沃兹”沃兹涅克。

sentences.english: Can you sort me out on how to write this preface?
sentences.chinese: 你能对怎样写这个前言给我提点建议吗？

sentences.english: This catalogue includes a foreword by Christophe W. Mao and essay by John Tancock.
sentences.chinese: 图录包括茅为清的前言及唐冠科撰写的文章。

sentences.english: This catalog contains a foreword by Christophe Mao and essays by Professor Zheng Shengtian and Professor Bai Qianshen.
sentences.chinese: 图录包括茅为清的前言及郑胜天和白谦慎撰写的文章。

sentences.english: This paper has about 35,000 words, it consists of four chapters except for the introduction and conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 全文三万五千余字，除前言和结语外，分为四章。

sentences.english: The foreword generally describes Jameson's academic career and then draws main part.
sentences.chinese: “前言”概述杰姆逊的学术生涯，并引出本文论题。

sentences.english: The dissertation is composed of four parts except the preface and is about 48,000 words.
sentences.chinese: 全文除前言外，分为四个部分，约四万八千字。

sentences.english: Light hydrocarbon tank is one of the main fixtures of natural gas production.
sentences.chinese: 前言轻烃储罐是天然气生产中的主要静装置之一。

sentences.english: This catalogue contains a foreword by Christophe Mao and an essay by Zheng Shengtian.
sentences.chinese: 图录包括茅为清的前言及郑胜天撰写的文章。

sentences.english: In her foreword, Spurling dates her fascination with Buck to her childhood reading.
sentences.chinese: 在前言中，斯普林提到，她从童年起就被赛珍珠吸引。

sentences.english: Its preface serves as a classic manifesto of late-nineteenth century naturalism.
sentences.chinese: 其前言作为一个典型的宣言晚十九世纪自然主义。

sentences.english: Reading the forward to the Lexicon you can alsosee that he had a sense of humor.
sentences.chinese: 读完词典的前言，你会发现他是个富有幽默感的家伙。

sentences.english: The preface summarizes the achievements of researches on the study of the system of Recommending Legates and the thinking of this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 前言概述九品中正制的研究情况及本文的写作思路。

sentences.english: The end and aim of the book is explained in the preface.
sentences.chinese: 本书的目的在前言中作了说明。

sentences.english: Gann's own words in the fo reword of the novel.
sentences.chinese: 这是江恩在他的小说前言里自己说的。

definition: guide (e.g. book or other printed material)
excerpt/selection (from a book)/to select/to choose an extract
start of literary work/opening song of ballad in Tanci style 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2]
variant of 編者按|编者按[bian1 zhe3 an4]
author's preface/autobiographical notes as introduction to a book
